channel.title: technology on Newsround
channel.description: Recent content in technology on Newsround

item.title: PS5 And PS4's Most-Downloaded Games Of 2025 Revealed, Including A Call Of Duty Surprise - GameSpot
item.description: Sports games reigned in 2025, and Battlefield 6 wasn’t far behind.

item.title: Naya Connect is a modular mechanical keyboard system for the indecisive - The Verge
item.description: Naya Connect is a modular mechanical keyboard ecosystem with a swappable numpad, trackball, a 6DoF spatial mouse, and more.

item.title: Nintendo, PlayStation, and Xbox update their 2020 pledge to improve player safety across our platforms - GamesIndustry.biz
item.description: Nintendo, Sony Interactive Entertainment, and Microsoft continue to collaborate in a bid to “improve player safety acro…

item.title: This Underrated Affordable Swiss Watch Brand Has a New Grail - Gear Patrol
item.description: Maurice Lacroix unveils its 1975 Master Grand Date Retrograde, which combines two high-end complications for less than you’d expect.

item.title: Pokémon Horizons: Season 2 Part 3 Available on Amazon, Apple TV, and YouTube - Pokemon.com
item.description: Pokémon Horizons: Season 2—The Search for Laqua Part 3 is now on Amazon, Apple TV, and YouTube.

item.title: Nvidia Proves It Still Has the Best Software for Better-Looking Games - Gizmodo
item.description: While 6x frame gen won’t be here until spring, better AI upscaling is more than welcome.

item.title: Ligand-specific activation trajectories dictate GPCR signalling in cells - Nature
item.description: Different agonists produce equilibria of at least four distinct active states of the G-protein-bound M2 muscarinic acetylcholine receptor, each with a different ability to activate G proteins.

item.title: Will Apple Announce New MacBook Pros This January? - MacRumors
item.description: While the entry-level 14-inch MacBook Pro was updated with an M5 chip in October, we are still waiting for higher-end MacBook Pro models with M5 Pro…

item.title: Gemini's new beta feature provides proactive responses based on your photos, emails, and more - TechCrunch
item.description: Personal Intelligence is off by default, as users have the option to choose if and when they want to connect their Google apps to Gemini.

item.title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons Update 3.0 Is Live Now, A Day Early - Game Informer
item.description: While version 3.0 is live now, islanders will have to wait another day for the Switch 2 upgrade to wash to shore.

item.title: Microsoft might have just leaked Forza Horizon 6’s release date - The Verge
item.description: A May 19th release date has appeared inside a Forza Horizon 5 notification.

item.title: Popular PC franchise Civilization comes to Apple Arcade on February 5 - Apple
item.description: In February, four new games join Apple Arcade, including Sid Meier’s Civilization VII Arcade Edition.

item.title: The new $1,100 2026 Lenovo business laptop is on sale for $400 at Amazon - thestreet.com
item.description: This laptop can handle multitasking spreadsheets, research tabs, and more.

item.title: 10 Soundbars You Need To Replace Your TV Audio With, According To Experts - bgr.com
item.description: Ultra-thin televisions look great and save tons of space, but tend to suffer when it comes to audio. These soundbars can help take it to the next level.

item.title: Peakto 2.6 Tracks Down All Your Duplicate Photos, No Matter Where They Are - PetaPixel
item.description: Find all those pesky duplicate photos in seconds.

item.title: Everything new in Livewire 4 - Laravel News
item.description: Livewire 4 is the biggest release yet—featuring single-file components, islands for isolated rendering, built-in drag and drop, optimistic UI, scoped CSS and JavaScript, and more.

item.title: Firefox 147 is here, and Thunderbird is close behind - theregister.com
item.description: : Latest update focuses on hardware acceleration, security tightening, and a handful of quality-of-life tweaks

item.title: Four contestants test their creativity to make Rogue Traders and retinues on Scrap Demon - Warhammer Community
item.description: What to watch on Warhammer TV this week.
